title: Rebekah Vardy bragged about sleeping with Pete Andre while still married in unearthed interview
text:

Rebekah Vardy once bragged about sleeping with Peter Andre while she was still married in a recently unearthed interview.

The WAG was just 21 at the time of their tryst in 2001 and met the singer when she was working at a promotions company.

She was with her first husband Mark Godden at the time, though said their marriage was coming to an end.

But the 37-year-old admitted that sex with Pete wasn't everything she'd dreamed of and he was "the worst lover she's ever had".

Speaking about their one-night stand in 2004, Becky said: "I told him I was married. I wanted to be honest and I knew my marriage was coming to an end.

(Image: PA)

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

"I thought he was going to be a fantastic lover. Then he took his trousers off!

"It wasn't worth the train fare."

Rebekah added: "He didn't even attempt to satisfy me!"

She also said his penis resembled a "miniature chipolata".

(Image: LightRocket via Getty Images)

Her marriage to Mark fell apart in just six months, and soon after she fell pregnant with her first child Megan, now 13.

The brunette has never publicly named the father.

She had a six year relationship with Oxford united player Luke Foster and they share nine-year-old Taylor.

Luke claimed she'd dumped him when she met Jamie Vardy, but she denies there was any overlap in the relationships.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

She married Jamie in 2016 and they share Sofia, four, and Finlay, two, while Jamie has daughter Ella, nine, from a previously relationship.

The interview resurfaced just days after Rebekah was accused of selling stories about Coleen Rooney from her private Instagram account.

She has denied the claims, insisting someone must have hacked her own account and stole posts from Coleen.
description: The WAG was just 21 at the time of their tryst in 2001 and called Peter 'the worst lover she's ever had'
